product_name: The North Face Remora Shirt - Women's
long_description: The North Face Remora shirt for women is a classic, wide-neck shirt with a slim fit that's easy to layer under fleece jackets, vests and sweaters for any casual outing. An enzyme wash gives the muted tones of the cotton-jersey slub fabric an ultrasoft finish for next-to-skin comfort. 3/4 sleeves; straight hem; self-fabric neck and cuffs; logo swing label at hip.
short_description: The North Face Remora shirt for women is a classic, wide-neck shirt with a slim fit that's easy to layer under fleece jackets, vests and sweaters for any casual outing.
